description:
We’d like to thank you for visiting our Illinois FindLaw profile. We know you are visiting this page because you, or someone you love, has been injured in an accident. Personal injury cases are extremely difficult. The pain, the frustration, the emotion, the bills and loss of income. The stress on you and your family. The bills that just keep piling up.

We know you have many questions. So it’s important that we communicate to you that it will not cost you a cent to call or email us about your personal injury matter. In fact, you won't pay a dime to us unless we collect money damages for you.

We are a personal injury law firm, and that’s the only thing that we do. We represent folks just like you that have been injured in any type of accident, be it in a car, on the job, on a motorcycle, by a doctor or hospital or by a defective product or drug.

Chuck Balkin has been providing legal services in the community he grew up in and loves for over 40 years. If you’ve been injured in an accident, just call us, we want to represent you. We'll be with you every step of the way. If you have questions, we’ll answer them. If you have concerns, we’ll address them. We have the experience, the compassion and the resources to get you the maximum amount of money you’re entitled to, in the shortest amount of time.

At Balkin & Mausner, we have one goal, one passion. That’s to get you the results you, and your family deserve. Please give us a call at the number in our profile and we'll get you and your family started on the path to recovery.
